item.title: Donations to Japan Needed
item.description:
The Tokyo Hackerspace is working with various communities and agencies in Japan to provide relief supplies following the earthquake, tsunami, and nuclear plant issues.

They are asking the global community to send specific items, which will then be boxed up into care packages. Runners will then distribute them to the …
item.dc:creator: steve

item.title: It's time for hacking, part I
item.description:
One of our members, `Steven L Smith <http://stevenlsmith.com/>`__, has recently been bitten by the clock bug. This post is part I of a multi-part series on some of his builds.

|image0|I’ve been interested in building kits for some time now, having previously built the Theremax …
